content.text: Match ends, Granada CF 1, Mallorca 2.
Second Half ends, Granada CF 1, Mallorca 2.
Goal!  Granada CF 1, Mallorca 2. Tomer Hemed (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Giovani dos Santos with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Juanma Ortiz.
Attempt missed. Aranda (Granada CF) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Yacine Brahimi following a set piece situation.
Michael Pereira (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Yacine Brahimi (Granada CF) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Michael Pereira (Mallorca).
Attempt saved. Nunes (Mallorca) header from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Giovani dos Santos with a cross.

Dangerous play by Diego Mainz (Granada CF).
Javi Márquez (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Attempt missed. Tomer Hemed (Mallorca) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left.
